title: Drugs: a primary film
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Drug abuse - Study and teaching

description: Presents vignettes of situations familiar to children to explore the correct use of drugs by the doctor and at home. Reveals the danger of drug misuse and emphasises the positive attitudes needed for a rich and healthy life. Suitable for upper primary level.
